EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Contract (1356557769.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Contract (1356557769.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hello Cathy, Nice to meet you via email. On behalf of everyone here at MBO Partners, we look forward to working with your firm. MBO Partners caters to two markets. Our first service is designed for independent consultants and small businsses <http://www.mbopartners.com/#howwehelp> who choose to plug into our MBO Services Cloud to make it easier for them to work with their clients. We take care of all the back office administrative, HR, regulatory and financial issues so they can stay focused on delivering on their services. The second is how we help enterprise organizations engage more efficiently and safely with their contract workforce <http://www.mboenterprise.com/how-we-help>. We have also put together a short one page collateral <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf> that explains how we work and the markets we serve. The following links provide our standard agreement <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_MSA_Template.pdf> and statement of work <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_SOW.pdf> we use when engaging our Associates with their clients. Please review and complete it, and return a signed copy to me. And, please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions. We are also more than happy to work with your standard agreement, if you prefer. Thanks again, and I look forward to working with you. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: David Mohr [mailto:david.mohr1@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, December 21, 2012 4:19 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: Cathy Inkeles Subject: MBO Partners Contract Sara,
Would you please contact Cathy Inkeles about a corp-to-corp contract with MBO Partners?
Thanks, David Mohr - CISM, CISSP, CISA, ITIL v2
IT Security Consultant (502) 855-0190Cathy Inkeles Account Manager A Woman Owned Small BusinessVERUS Staffing Solutions 111 Rockville Pike | Suite 735 | Rockville MD 20850 USA (o): 301-658-6839 <tel:301-658-6839> | (home office): 301-987-0442 <tel:301-987-0442> | fax: 240-720-0050 <tel:240-720-0050>cinkeles@verus.com <mailto:sbirnbach@verus.com> | www.verus.com <http://www.verus.com>
